title: Jorge Marcel Peimbertd Galindo Resume
Summary: 7+ years of experience developing, implementing and analyzing web application.
Strong React experience coding stateful and stateless components. Further familiarized with the life cycle components, context and JSX.
Extensively work on React Native framework to write, build and test APK/IPA.
Used Redux to enhance React applications serving one way bind data flow injecting the data only to components subscribed, React-Router for routing between pages.
Expert in Typescript for typo code to avoid errors and make pure functions.
Expert in HTML5 implementing correct semantic typing, CSS3 with advance knowledge in animations/transitions, and object-oriented JavaScript programming.
Very Proficient on NodeJS servers in back end creating them with Express aided by middlewares such as body-parser, cookie-parser, express-session, passport, jwt.
Worked with NodeJS as development tool with a package of technologies such as Webpack, webpack-server, Typescript, Babel, css-loader, html-loader, and create-react-app.
Able to deploy Microservices in AWS assisted by Kubernetes and Docker.
Experience in docker-compose for a quick build and mount of an image in a container, Further knowledge in YAML config files for Kubernetes, docker and AWS.
Utilized preprocessors such as Handlebars, pug for html and SASS for CSS files.
Used Agile methodology with Scrum and Feature processes to develop applications.
Expert knowledge in JS concepts (closures, prototype, scope, context and hoisting).
Competent in ES6 awareness typing features such as Promises, Classes, Arrow functions, destructuring, rest/spread operator, async/await, among others.
Experienced using design patterns structural, behavioral and creational such as Module, Singleton, Pub/Sub, Constructor, Factory, MV* (MVC, MVP, MVVM).
Excellent working in front end with React, React Native or jQuery.
Able to do correct Restful web services to serve assets. Further excellent integration of CRUD in the web service for management of DB resources.
Vast knowledge in NPM and Yarn to get modules and libraries packages. Further how package json works between the different type of dependencies.
Used Webpack bundler to transpile, minified, and bundle code.
Expert on GIT VCS used only git bash to type commands and configuration of GIT.
Excellent testing knowledge regarding BDD and TDD, creating test suites and unit tests running them on Mocha or Jest, and complementing with Sinon, Chai.
Was in involved in identifying well known of cross browser issues and polyfills for solutions and compatibility. Worked with MongoDB databases reaching endpoint through Mongoose.
